name: binclock
tagline: A simple C++ program to show system time with binary clock
body: binclock ======== ## Description ## A simple C++ program to show system time with binary clock ## How to run ## ``` $ git clone https://github.com/hasit/binclock.git ``` ``` $ cd ~/binclock/ ``` ``` $ g++ binclock.cpp -o bc ``` ``` $ ./bc ``` ## How to read the clock ## A picture explaining how to read a binary clock
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
